 10#ifndef VSIP_OPT_EXPR_EVAL_FASTCONV_HPP
 11#define VSIP_OPT_EXPR_EVAL_FASTCONV_HPP
 12
 13#include <vsip/opt/expr/assign_fwd.hpp>
 14#include <vsip/core/fft.hpp>

 16namespace vsip_csl

 18namespace dispatcher

 21/// Evaluator for LHS = inv_fftm(vmmul(V, fftm(M)))
 22///  where V is a vector of coefficients
 23template <typename LHS,
 24	  template <typename> class F1, typename M,
 25 	  template <typename> class F2, typename V>
 26struct Evaluator<op::assign<2>, be::fc_expr,
 27  void(LHS &,
 28       expr::Unary<F2,
 29         expr::Vmmul<0, V,
 30           expr::Unary<F1, M> const> const> const &),
 31  typename enable_if_c<
 32    expr::is_fftm_functor<F1<M> >::value &&
 33    expr::is_fftm_functor<F2<
 34      expr::Vmmul<0, V, expr::Unary<F1, M> const> const> >::value>::type>
 35{
 36  static char const *name() { return "fc_expr-vw";}
 37
 38  typedef expr::Unary<F1, M> fft_matblock_type;
 39  typedef expr::Vmmul<0, V, fft_matblock_type const> inv_block_type;
 40  typedef expr::Unary<F2, inv_block_type const> RHS;
 41
 42  typedef F1<M> fwd_fft_type;
 43  typedef typename fwd_fft_type::backend_type fwd_backend_type;
 44  typedef typename fwd_fft_type::workspace_type fwd_workspace_type;
 45
 46  typedef F2<inv_block_type const> inv_fft_type;
 47  typedef typename inv_fft_type::backend_type inv_backend_type;
 48  typedef typename inv_fft_type::workspace_type inv_workspace_type;
 49
 50  typedef typename LHS::value_type lhs_value_type;
 51  typedef typename RHS::value_type rhs_value_type;
 52
 53  static bool const ct_valid = true;
 54
 55  static bool rt_valid(LHS &, RHS const &rhs)
 56  {
 57#if 0
 58    // Check if the evaluator supports the scaling implied by
 59    // the FFTs.
 60    //
 61    // This evaluator uses the FFTs directly, so it will implicitly
 62    // follow the requested scaling.  However, if this evaluator is
 63    // adapted to use other fast convolution implementations that
 64    // have limited scaling (such as only unit), this check will
 65    // be necessary.
 66    
 67    typedef typename impl::Scalar_of<T>::type scalar_type;
 68
 69    fwd_workspace_type const &fwd_workspace(rhs.arg().get_mblk().operation().workspace());
 70    inv_workspace_type const &inv_workspace(rhs.operation().workspace());
 71    // Check FFT scaling totals 1
 72    return almost_equal(fwd_workspace.scale() * inv_workspace.scale(), scalar_type(1));
 73#else
 74    (void)rhs;
 75    return true;
 76#endif
 77  }
 78  
 79  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
 80  {
 81    length_type rows = lhs.size(2, 0);
 82    length_type cols = lhs.size(2, 1);
 83    Matrix<rhs_value_type> tmp(rows, cols);
 84
 85    Vector<typename V::value_type, V> w(const_cast<V &>(rhs.arg().get_vblk()));
 86    Matrix<typename M::value_type, M> in(const_cast<M &>(rhs.arg().get_mblk().arg()));
 87    Matrix<lhs_value_type, LHS> out(lhs);
 88
 89    fwd_workspace_type const &fwd_workspace (rhs.arg().get_mblk().operation().workspace());
 90    fwd_backend_type &fwd_backend (const_cast<fwd_backend_type&>(rhs.arg().get_mblk().operation().backend()));
 91
 92    inv_workspace_type const &inv_workspace(rhs.operation().workspace());
 93    inv_backend_type &inv_backend(const_cast<inv_backend_type&>(rhs.operation().backend()));
 94
 95    fwd_workspace.out_of_place(&fwd_backend, in, tmp);
 96    for (index_type r=0; r<rows; ++r)
 97      tmp.row(r) *= w;
 98    inv_workspace.out_of_place(&inv_backend, tmp, out);
 99  }
100};
101
102/// Evaluator for LHS = inv_fftm(C * fftm(M))
103///  where C is a matrix of coefficients
104template <typename LHS,
105	  template <typename> class F1, typename M,
106	  template <typename> class F2, typename C>
107struct Evaluator<op::assign<2>, be::fc_expr,
108  void(LHS &,
109       expr::Unary<F2, expr::Binary<expr::op::Mult, C,
110       expr::Unary<F1, M> const, true> const> const &),
111  typename enable_if_c<
112    expr::is_fftm_functor<F1<M> >::value &&
113    expr::is_fftm_functor<F2<expr::Binary<expr::op::Mult, 
114      C, expr::Unary<F1, M> const, true> const> >::value>::type>
115{
116  static char const* name() { return "Fc_expr_tag-mwl"; }
117
118  typedef expr::Unary<F1, M> fftm_matblock_type;
119  typedef expr::Binary<expr::op::Mult, C, fftm_matblock_type const, true> inv_block_type;
120  typedef expr::Unary<F2, inv_block_type const> RHS;
121
122  typedef F1<M> fwd_fftm_type;
123  typedef typename fwd_fftm_type::backend_type fwd_backend_type;
124  typedef typename fwd_fftm_type::workspace_type fwd_workspace_type;
125
126  typedef F2<inv_block_type const> inv_fftm_type;
127  typedef typename inv_fftm_type::backend_type inv_backend_type;
128  typedef typename inv_fftm_type::workspace_type inv_workspace_type;
129
130  typedef typename LHS::value_type lhs_value_type;
131  typedef typename RHS::value_type rhs_value_type;
132
133  static bool const ct_valid = true;
134
135  static bool rt_valid(LHS &, RHS const &) { return true;}
136  
137  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
138  {
139    length_type rows = lhs.size(2, 0);
140    length_type cols = lhs.size(2, 1);
141    Matrix<rhs_value_type> tmp(rows, cols);
142
143    Matrix<typename C::value_type, C>
144      w(const_cast<C &>(rhs.arg().arg1()));
145    Matrix<typename M::value_type, M>
146      in(const_cast<M &>(rhs.arg().arg2().arg()));
147    Matrix<lhs_value_type, LHS> out(lhs);
148
149    fwd_workspace_type const &fwd_workspace (rhs.arg().arg2().operation().workspace());
150    fwd_backend_type &fwd_backend (const_cast<fwd_backend_type&>(rhs.arg().arg2().operation().backend()));
151
152    inv_workspace_type const &inv_workspace(rhs.operation().workspace());
153    inv_backend_type &inv_backend (const_cast<inv_backend_type&>(rhs.operation().backend()));
154
155    fwd_workspace.out_of_place(&fwd_backend, in, tmp);
156    tmp *= w;
157    inv_workspace.out_of_place(&inv_backend, tmp, out);
158  }
159};
160
161/// Evaluator for LHS = inv_fftm(fftm(M) * C)
162///  where C is a matrix of coefficients
163template <typename LHS,
164	  template <typename> class F1, typename M,
165	  template <typename> class F2, typename C>
166struct Evaluator<op::assign<2>, be::fc_expr,
167  void(LHS &,
168       expr::Unary<F2,
169         expr::Binary<expr::op::Mult,
170           expr::Unary<F1, M> const, C, true> const> const &),
171  typename enable_if_c<
172    expr::is_fftm_functor<F1<M> >::value &&
173    expr::is_fftm_functor<F2<expr::Binary<expr::op::Mult, 
174      expr::Unary<F1, M> const, C, true> const> >::value>::type>
175{
176  static char const *name() { return "fc_expr-mwr";}
177
178  typedef expr::Unary<F1, M> fftm_block_type;
179  typedef expr::Binary<expr::op::Mult, fftm_block_type const, C, true> inv_block_type;
180  typedef expr::Unary<F2, inv_block_type const> RHS;
181
182  typedef F1<M> fwd_fftm_type;
183  typedef typename fwd_fftm_type::backend_type fwd_backend_type;
184  typedef typename fwd_fftm_type::workspace_type fwd_workspace_type;
185
186  typedef F2<inv_block_type const> inv_fftm_type;
187  typedef typename inv_fftm_type::backend_type inv_backend_type;
188  typedef typename inv_fftm_type::workspace_type inv_workspace_type;
189
190  typedef typename LHS::value_type lhs_value_type;
191  typedef typename RHS::value_type rhs_value_type;
192
193  static bool const ct_valid = true;
194
195  static bool rt_valid(LHS &, RHS const &) { return true;}
196  
197  static void exec(LHS &lhs, RHS const &rhs)
198  {
199    length_type rows = lhs.size(2, 0);
200    length_type cols = lhs.size(2, 1);
201    Matrix<rhs_value_type> tmp(rows, cols);
202
203    Matrix<typename C::value_type, C> w(const_cast<C &>(rhs.arg().arg2()));
204    Matrix<typename M::value_type, M> in(const_cast<M &>(rhs.arg().arg1().arg()));
205    Matrix<lhs_value_type, LHS> out(lhs);
206
207    fwd_workspace_type const &fwd_workspace(rhs.arg().arg1().operation().workspace());
208    fwd_backend_type &fwd_backend(const_cast<fwd_backend_type &>(rhs.arg().arg1().operation().backend()));
209    inv_workspace_type const &inv_workspace(rhs.operation().workspace());
210    inv_backend_type &inv_backend(const_cast<inv_backend_type &>(rhs.operation().backend()));
211
212    fwd_workspace.out_of_place(&fwd_backend, in, tmp);
213    tmp *= w;
214    inv_workspace.out_of_place(&inv_backend, tmp, out);
215  }
216};
